description: go-tour: add .hgignore, and use "The Go Authors" in LICENSE

messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/

For some reason I can't clpatch this into my client:

~/gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go-tour% hg clpatch 5706059
mkdir : no such file or directory
hgpatch failed

No time to diagnose it now, I'll submit this when I can.

On 1 March 2012 10:13, Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM

On 2012/02/29 23:21:34, adg wrote:
> For some reason I can't clpatch this into my client:
> 
> ~/gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go-tour% hg clpatch 5706059
> mkdir : no such file or directory
> hgpatch failed
Reproduced on my system. I will fix it.

On 2012/03/01 08:52:31, minux wrote:
> On 2012/02/29 23:21:34, adg wrote:
> > For some reason I can't clpatch this into my client:
> > 
> > ~/gocode/src/code.google.com/p/go-tour% hg clpatch 5706059
> > mkdir : no such file or directory
> > hgpatch failed
> Reproduced on my system. I will fix it.
http://codereview.appspot.com/5714057/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=af614bf4623b ***

go-tour: add .hgignore, and use "The Go Authors" in LICENSE

R=adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5706059

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 5706059: go-tour: add .hgignore, and use "The Go Authors" in LICENSE
